scripts.boot-full: npm install && npm run boot -- --scope=@diyart/dev && npm run build-dev && npm run boot && npm run build
scripts.clean-full: npm run clean && node ./scripts/dev-cli run clean-full && lerna clean --yes
scripts.format-full: node ./scripts/dev-cli run prettier && npm run format
scripts.build-production: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./scripts/dev-cli run build-production
scripts.start-dev: npm run build && docker-compose -p diyart_development -f ./docker/development/docker-compose.yml up
